name: Arctic Pandemic
description:
Mouse input only:

  • Left click on ground to move
  • Left click on objects to interact
  • Right click on object to inspect
  • You can use items in the inventory by clicking on it once, then click on an object in the scene to interact with it.
  • You can combine inventory items: click on the first item, then click on the second.

--------------------

In a galaxy very, very near...
The inhabitants of Planet RGB101 were getting terribly sick.
When they thought they were invincibles, they were faced with an unexpected challenge.
Blinded by their insatiable enjoyment of colorful lights...
they generated an excessive amount of termal energy and melted the precious ice caps.

A beast, lying dormant in ice for thousands of years has been uncovered...
and within its contaminated corpse, a deadly bacteria was patiently waiting to infect the first creature who would get into contact with it...

You, RGBot, have less than 3 days to save the populace.
You must acquire an original bacteria sample and analyse it in order to create a cure...
